##

```{r}
library(SensoMineR)
library(FactoMineR)
experts <- read.table(file = "../data/perfumes.csv", header = TRUE, sep = ",",
                      dec = ".", quote= "\"")

# By using thesubset function, the experts dataset is divided by session.
perfumes_qda_session1 <- subset(experts,Session==1)

res1 <- decat(perfumes_qda_session1,formul="~Product+Panelist",firstvar=5,graph=FALSE)

# A PCA is performed on the table of means for each session using the PCA function.
res1.pca <- PCA(res1$adjmean)

```
